Submodules¶

surge.tools.graphics.change_luminance module¶

surge.tools.graphics.change_luminance.change_luminance(luminance, rgb_tuple)[source]¶

Sets the luminance of an RBG color.

Returns a tuple.

surge.tools.graphics.desaturate_rgb module¶

surge.tools.graphics.desaturate_rgb.desaturate_rgb(saturation, rgb_tuple)[source]¶

Changes the saturuation of an RGB color.

Returns a tuple.

surge.tools.graphics.grayscale_to_rgb module¶

surge.tools.graphics.grayscale_to_rgb.grayscale_to_rgb(value)[source]¶

Converts a grayscale value to an equivalent RGB color.

Returns a tuple.

surge.tools.graphics.interpolate_rgb module¶

surge.tools.graphics.interpolate_rgb.interpolate_rgb(value, rgb0, rgb1)[source]¶

Interpolates between two RGB colors.

Returns a tuple.

surge.tools.graphics.scheme_rgb_color module¶

surge.tools.graphics.scheme_rgb_color.scheme_rgb_color(rgb_tuple)[source]¶

Converts RGB color to Scheme format.

Returns an Abjad ‘Scheme’ object.
